item.title: Cloud Retroarch
item.description: In today’s installment of “let’s cloud all the things,” I want to give myself access to my wonderful RetroArch game library from more than just my Raspberry Pi. I want to be able to access my exact same games (with saves included) from any location. Can I pull it off? At the time of writing this sentence, I actually have no idea, but let’s give it a shot! First thing’s first, choosing a cloud storage solution.
